text: Rafał Kazimierz Trzaskowski (pronounced ; born 17 January 1972) is a Polish politician. In November 2018, he became the Mayor of Warsaw. He is also a political scientist. In May 2020, Trzaskowski became the Civic Platform's candidate for Presidency of Poland in the presidential election. He lost the election to incumbent President Andrzej Duda. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Warsaw Category:Political scientists
title: Rafał Trzaskowski
